Russell's suit was filed three days before this year's Globes ceremony, which attracted Hollywood stars such as Angelina Jolie , Halle Berry and honored actor Robert DeNiro with a lifetime achievement award. Without a shred of evidence,( Russell's firm) manufactured a fanciful tale of Hollywood intrigue that harkens back to the early days of rock'n roll radio, with its colorful reference to` payola,' the lawsuit states.
